abilities.name: Infected Cleaver
abilities.description: Active: Dr. Mundo hurls a cleaver in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits and  slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:20 / 22.5 / 25 / 27.5 / 30% of target's current health
levelings: Magic Damage:20 / 22.5 / 25 / 27.5 / 30% of target's current health
Health Refund On Hit:»20 / 24 / 28 / 32 / 36«Health Refund On Kill:40 / 48 / 56 / 64 / 72
descriptions: Active: Dr. Mundo hurls a cleaver in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy it hits and  slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.
Infected Cleaver has a minimum damage threshold, and is capped against  minions and  monsters.
If Infected Cleaver hits an enemy, Dr. Mundo  heals for 40% of the  health cost, increased to 80% if it kills an enemy.

abilities.name: Burning Agony
abilities.description: Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, gaining 30%  Tenacity and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.
descriptions: Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, gaining 30%  Tenacity and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to nearby enemies.
Burning Agony can be toggled off after 0.5 seconds of toggling on.
If Dr. Mundo's health falls below Burning Agony's  health cost while toggled on, the ability is toggled off automatically and put on a 1 second  cooldown.

abilities.name: Masochism
abilities.description: Passive: Taking magic damage or paying a  health cost increases Dr. Mundo's  magic resistance by 3% for 2 seconds, stacking up to an amount.
levelings:
Flat Bonus AD:40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100
Maximum Missing Health Bonus AD:»20 / 35 / 50 / 65 / 80«Maximum Bonus AD:60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180
Bonus Physical Damage:3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% of his maximum health
descriptions: Passive: Taking magic damage or paying a  health cost increases Dr. Mundo's  magic resistance by 3% for 2 seconds, stacking up to an amount.
Active: Dr. Mundo gains  bonus attack damage for 5 seconds, increased by an amount based on his percentage missing health.
Additionally, Dr. Mundo's next basic attack within the duration will cost health, but gains  25 bonus range and deals bonus physical damage.
Masochism  resets Dr. Mundo's basic attack timer.

abilities.name: Sadism
abilities.description: Active: Dr. Mundo regenerates  health over 12 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed for the duration.
abilities.leveling: Total Regeneration:»50 / 62.5 / 75 / 87.5 / 100% maximum health«Regeneration Per Second:4.17 / 5.21 / 6.25 / 7.29 / 8.33% maximum healthBonus Movement Speed:15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35%

descriptions: Active: Dr. Mundo regenerates  health over 12 seconds and gains  bonus movement speed for the duration.

name: Dr. Mundo
title: the Madman of Zaun
blurb: Utterly insane, unrepentantly homicidal, and horrifyingly purple, Dr. Mundo is what keeps many of Zaun's citizens indoors on particularly dark nights. This monosyllabic monstrosity seems to want nothing more than pain—both the giving of it, and the...
